Desc.entry: Community centre hosting a variety of activities. Runs 4 week summer scheme during school holidays. Can be booked for children's parties (aged 3-10 years). Also runs Youth Club for young people aged 13-19 years (see separate entry).

ProviderServiceDetails.entry: Tues-Fri 6.30-10pm, please contact for session details

category.entry: COMMUNITY CENTRES AND ASSOCIATIONS - POSTAL DISTRICT 4
